articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from China and Russia
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from China and Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter and a gift in the joint name of the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact and a gift by the director of the State Academic Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia on the occasion of the February holiday.
 The congratulatory letter and gifts were conveyed to DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Jin Su on Feb. 10 by the vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact and to DPRK Ambassador to Russia Pak Ui Chun on Feb. 8 by Elena Scherbakova, director of the State Academic Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia.

articles.title: Danger of U.S. Defense Department's "Report" Disclosed
articles.content:
Danger of U.S. Defense Department's "Report" Disclosed 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification on Feb. 8 reportedly issued a commentary dealing with the danger of the "Quadrennial U.S. Defense Review Report" announced by the U.S. Defense Department on Feb. 3.
 The commentary said that the "report" labeled the north as "a hostile regime" and, on this basis, calls for setting up a new command whereby the commanding system is simplified and bolstering up special units such as a 3,000-strong special unit of the marines, special units of all services and formations of unmanned reconnaissance planes.    
 It is as clear as noonday that all these war means and forces will be targeted against the Korean Peninsula, the commentary noted.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's famous works "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy", "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" and "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" were held by the Juche Idea Study Society of Delhi, India, the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in the period from Feb. 4 to 8 on the occasion of the February holiday.
 All speakers warmly congratulated Kim Jong Il on his birthday, deeply explained and proved the historic significance of his works and expressed their resolutions to further deepen the study of them.    
 B.C. Gupta, chairman of the Indian society, said that through his decades-long energetic ideological and theoretical activities Kim Jong Il comprehensively systemized and developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, adding that the Songun politics pursued by him fully meets the requirements of the Juche idea.
 Thomas Losh, chief of the Austrian group, noted that the works of Kim Jong Il serve as a powerful weapon for achieving the independent cause of the popular masses now that there is the acute confrontation between the forces for independence and domination and the imperialists have become undisguised in their moves. 
 Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican institute, noted that Kim Jong Il regarded it a noble moral obligation of revolutionaries to respect the forerunners of the revolution and led the people to have a correct viewpoint and attitude on the forerunners of the revolution, adding that this is another great exploit performed by him in the way of carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Intensified Struggle against Conclusion of FTA Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Struggle against Conclusion of FTA Called for 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Representatives of 62 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People's Solidarity, the "National Alliance for Democracy and Reunification", the Moviemen's Measure Committee for Defending Screen Quota, the General Federation of Korean National Artistes, the Citizens' Federation of the Movement for Democratic Press and the Environment Movement Association reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 7 at which they decided to wage a strong struggle against the negotiations for the conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. "Free Trade Agreement" (FTA).
 Speakers at the press conference said that their organizations will form an all-people measure committee for defending Korean films and opposing the conclusion of south Korea-U.S. FTA grouping many civic and public organizations and stand against the negotiations for the above-said conclusion.    
 The representatives of civic and public organizations agreed to hold joint meetings with organizations of people from all walks of life in the future so as to form the all-people measure committee and, at the same time, hold a candlelight cultural function for checking the conclusion of FTA.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Indonesia
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Indonesia 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Vanguard Party of Indonesia, in a statement on Feb. 9 expressed full support to all the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the independent reunification of the country in the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration which was adopted and published at the north-south summit in 2000.
 The idea of "By our nation itself" clearly indicating the correct way of Korea's reunification is not only raising the Korean people's consciousness of independence but preserving the national character and leading them to the road of reunification and national unity, she noted.    
 She expressed the conviction that the Korean nation would valiantly advance along the road of independent reunification, meeting the challenges of history with one and the same desire and will.

articles.title: Working People's Organizations Celebrate February 16
Combined Performance Given by Art Groups of Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Combined Performance Given by Art Groups of Ministry of People's Armed Forces 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Art groups of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a combined performance at the April 25 House of Culture on Feb. 14 to celebrate February 16.
 Appreciating the performance were Kim Yong Chun, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, leading officials of the ministry and servicepersons.    
 In the numbers such as choruses "Best Wishes for the Good Health of Comrade Supreme Commander," "Road to Far-off Front" and men's chorus "Joy in Greeting the Sun" the performers sang high praises of the highest honor and pride of having 
Kim Jong Il as the supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces because he is unboundedly praised by all people as the sun of the 21st century and the loyalty of all the servicepersons and people who wish the headquarters of the revolution safety.
 Witty talk "Bright Face," national instrumental ensemble "Post in Spring" and other numbers truthfully represented the revolutionary optimism and militant spirit of the Korean servicepersons who are exalting their honor as the pacesetters in the Songun era and a shock brigade for the building of a great prosperous powerful nation, firmly holding the arms of revolution in hands.    
 Their repertoire also included story-telling  and song "For the Motherland," group poem-reciting "Let's Keep Step with the General's  Revolutionary Daily Program," trumpet trio and chorus "Let's Become the Seventh Regiment of Modern Type" which depict the revolutionary determination of the KPA to firmly defend the forefront of the country.

Overseas Koreans' Art Groups Give Premiere Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Art Groups Give Premiere Here
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Art groups of overseas Koreans gave their premiere at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall on Feb. 14 to celebrate February 16.
 Korean artistes from China, the United States and Canada put on the stage those works they prepared with their ardent reverence for leader Kim Jong Il.
 Piano solo "Dear General, Where Are You", an immortal classic work, orchestra "General of Korea", piano concerto "Snowstorm on Mt. Paektu", male vocal solo "Soldiers Live Near the General", female vocal solo "Fatherland, Prosper" and other songs the Korean people are fond of were acclaimed by the audience.
 The premiere was overflowing with feelings of deep trust and reverence for Kim Jong Il, the benevolent father of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification.
 Appreciating the performance were officials concerned and working people in the city.
 Among the audience were overseas Koreans including members of the congratulatory groups of the Federation of Koreans in Canada and the Federation of Koreans in Australia.    
 The performance continues.

Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Its Premiere
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Its Premiere
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A combined song and dance performance "For Leap Forward under Leadership of General" was given by the art troupe of Koreans in Japan at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre Tuesday in celebration of February 16.
 They raised the curtain with mixed chorus "We Have Come to See the General" representing the best wishes of the Koreans in Japan for leader Kim Jong Il who has demonstrated all over the world the dignity and might of the socialist homeland of Juche and the Korean nation with the great Songun revolutionary leadership.
 They sang high praises of the unbounded honor and pride of holding the peerlessly great man in high esteem as the father of the nation through colorful numbers such as female vocal solo "February Is Spring", solo dance "Chima and Jokori, Korean Long Skirt and Jacket protected by General Kim Jong Il" and narration and song "We Believe in You as in Heaven."    
 In the songs replete with revolutionary stamina and optimism including mixed duet "In the Morning for Start", mixed sextet "Let's Advance Faster for Higher Goal" and male vocal solo "Let's Live for Morrow", they truthfully represented the proud appearance of the Koreans in Japan dynamically advancing with patriotism, always keeping pace with the people in the homeland full of great ambition and confidence even in the far-off alien land.    
 The performance was high in ideological value and artistry, rich in emotion and national flavor. It was highly acclaimed by the audience as it successfully represented the firm determination of the compatriots in Japan to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the great sun of the 21st century. 
 Appreciating the performance were Kim Jin Song, minister of Culture, officials concerned and working people in the city. 
 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Kuwait
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Kuwait
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Sheikh Nasser Al-Muhammad Al-Ahmad Al-Sabah upon his appointment as prime minister of Kuwait.
 The message wished him success in his new responsible job as well as good health and happiness.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets General Secretary of WPB
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets General Secretary of WPB
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with Baudouin Deckers, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Belgium, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 The general secretary noted that since the collapse of socialism in East European countries the Workers' Party of Korea has energetically struggled for the revival of the socialist movement, holding higher the banner of Juche. Thanks to the Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il socialism in Korea continues making a long drive following up the victory, he said.
